thread.title: China calls on US and North Korea to have talks as soon as possible

author: Etienne Oliveau
title: China calls on US and North Korea to have talks as soon as possible

organizations.name: published updated moments ago reuters etienne oliveau

text:
Taxes China calls on US and North Korea to have talks as soon as possible China's foreign minister Wang Yi on Thursday said that peace must prevail, amid signs of easing tension over North Korea's nuclear and missile threats. Published 13 Hours Ago Reuters Etienne Oliveau | Getty Images Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi attends a meeting at the Great Hall of the People on October 19, 2017 in Beijing, China. 
China's foreign minister Wang Yi called on the United States and North Korea on Thursday to have talks as soon as possible. 
He said that peace must prevail, amid signs of easing tension over North Korea's nuclear and missile threats. 
Wang made the comments during a news briefing as part of the annual meeting of China's parliament.
